description: React component for a drag-and-drop scheduling interface, displaying a timeline with operations and work centers, supporting real-time updates via WebSocket and backend persistence.

methods.name: normalizeSchedulerMsg
methods.description: Parses incoming WebSocket messages to determine the type of scheduler update and extract data.

methods.name: onChange
methods.description: Handles user-initiated changes to operations, performs optimistic UI updates, and updates backend.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Invalidates and refetches the schedule board data to ensure consistency with backend.
